replies.body:
New Years resolution?

What did you improve on in 2015?

What did you get worse in in 2015?

Did you complete the previous year'a resolution?

Happy New Year :D

By the way, think of this.

The last time you took a shower was last year. 

The last time you slept was last year.

The last time you brushed your teeth was last year.

The last time you changed your underwear was last year. 

The last time you sat and ate a proper meal was LAST YEAR!

Idk, I just find it funny when you can make yourself look so weird and disgusting like this xD

Would love to see you online sometime. :)
